import "./topbar.scss"; import { Mail } from "@material-ui/icons"; const Topbar = ({ menuOpen, setMenuOpen }) => { return (
pL
{/* */} oddporson
porsonlee@gmail.com
setMenuOpen(!menuOpen)}>
); }; export default Topbar;
